Question:
Nquma ukuhlushwa kwe-H + (aq) ku-1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, isixazululo. (I-Ka ye-phenol yi-1 × 10 ^ -10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Kulula ukuthola inqwaba ye-H+ (aq) esixazululweni se-phenol ngokusebenzisa i-Ka ye-phenol.

I-Ka ye-phenol inikwe njengo-1 × 10^-10.

Siyazi ukuthi i-Ka = ([H+][C6H5O-])/[C6H5OH]

Njengoba i-phenol ingu-1.0 M, singacabanga ukuthi [C6H5OH] = 1.0 M futhi [C6H5O-] ≈ 0 M.

Ngakho-ke, i-Ka = ([H+][0])/[1.0] = [H+] × 0/1.0 = 0

Lokhu kusho ukuthi [H+] = Ka × [C6H5OH] = (1 × 10^-10) × 1.0 = 1 × 10^-10 M

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ithi A. 1 × 10^-10 M.

Question:
I-voltage eyenziwe ku-inductor imelwe njengoba,
A.umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye ne-current ngayo.
B.isilinganiso se-inductance yayo kuze kube manje ngayo.
C.isilinganiso samanje ngokusebenzisa kwayo ku-inductance yayo.
D.umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwamanje ngayo.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele ithi D. umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwamanje ngayo.

I-voltage eyenziwe ku-inductor incike ku-inductance (L) kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwe-current (di/dt) ngayo. Lokhu kususelwa ku-Faraday's law of induction, okuchaza ukuthi i-voltage ekhiqizwe ku-inductor ilingana nomkhiqizo we-inductance kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwe-current.

Ngamanye amazwi, i-voltage (V) ingenziwa nge-formula:

V = L * (di/dt)

lapho:
- L imele i-inductance ye-inductor (ikalwa nge-Henry, H)  
- di/dt imele izinga lokushintsha kwe-current ngesikhathi (ikalwa nge-ampere/second, A/s)

Ngakho-ke, uma i-inductance ye-inductor noma izinga lokushintsha kwe-current lishintsha, i-voltage ekhiqizwe ku-inductor nayo izoshintsha ngokuhambelana nalokho.

Question:

Question:
Ingabe ukubulawa okungekho emthethweni okwenziwe nguNgqongqoshe wezwe X phesheya kuyisenzo se-jure imperii noma i-jure gestionis?
A.Ukuziphatha okunjalo kuyisenzo somphakathi (jure imperii)
B.Ukuziphatha okunjalo akukaze kuhehe amasosha omzimba
C.Ukuziphatha okunjalo kuyisenzo sangasese (jure gestionis)
D.Ukuziphatha okunjalo kuyisenzo somphakathi kodwa kuvikelwa ukuvikeleka
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile yi A. Ukuziphatha okunjalo kuyisenzo somphakathi (jure imperii).

Ukubulawa okungekho emthethweni okwenziwe nguNgqongqoshe wezwe phesheya kuthathwa njengesenzo somphakathi (jure imperii) ngoba:

- Kwenziwa ngumuntu osemagunyeni kahulumeni (uNgqongqoshe) 
- Kuyingxenye yemisebenzi kahulumeni nokwenza isinqumo ngokubulala
- Akusona isenzo sezohwebo noma esingasese (jure gestionis)

Ngakho-ke, njengoba kuyisenzo esigunyazwe umbuso futhi singaphansi kwamandla kahulumeni, sithathwa njengesenzo se-jure imperii, hhayi i-jure gestionis. Lokhu kusho ukuthi isenzo sivikelelwe ukungabanjwa ngaphandle kwemvume yezwe.

Question:

Question:
Lo mbuzo ubhekisela olwazini olulandelayo.
Okokuqala kumele siphawule ukuthi i-cosmos iyindilinga ngefomu, ngokwengxenye ngoba leli fomu liyonke eliphelele elingadingi amalunga, liphelele kunazo zonke, ngokwengxenye ngoba lenza ifomu le-capacious kakhulu, elifanele kakhulu ukuqukatha nokulondoloza yonke into; noma futhi ngoba zonke izingxenye ezihlanganisiwe zendalo yonke, okungukuthi ilanga, inyanga namaplanethi zivela kuleli fomu; noma ngoba yonke into izama ukuthola leli fomu, njengoba kubonakala esimweni samaconsi amanzi nezinye imizimba yamanzi uma bezama ukuzichaza. Ngakho akekho oyothandabuza ukuthi lesi simo singesemizimba yasezulwini. ...
Ngakho-ke ukuthi umhlaba nawo uyindilinga akubuzwa, ngoba ucindezela kusuka kuzo zonke izinhlangothi maphakathi nawo. Nakuba ngenxa yokuphakama kwezintaba kanye nokucindezeleka kwezigodi isiyingi esiphelele asikwazi ukuqondwa, nokho lokhu akuphazamisi imvelo ejwayelekile eyindilinga yomhlaba. ...
Njengoba sekukhonjisiwe ukuthi umhlaba unesimo se-sphere, kumele sicabangele ukuthi ukunyakaza nakho kuhambisana yini nalesi simo, nokuthi umhlaba uphethe yiphi indawo endaweni yonke. ... Iningi elikhulu lababhali yebo liyavuma ukuthi umhlaba umi maphakathi nendawo yonke, futhi ubheka njengento engacabangeki futhi ehlekisayo ukucabanga okuphambene nalokho. Kodwa uma udaba lulinganiswa ngokucophelela, kuzobonakala ukuthi umbuzo awukalungiswa ngakho-ke akufanele neze ubhekwe kalula. Lonke ushintsho lwendawo olubonwayo lufanele, okungukuthi, ukunyakaza kwento ebonakalayo noma yombukeli, noma ukunyakaza kokubili. ... Manje kuvela emhlabeni ukuthi ukuguquka kwamazulu kubonwa futhi kukhiqizwa amehlo ethu. Ngakho-ke uma umhlaba unganyakazi lokhu kunyakaza kumele kwenzeke kukho konke okungaphandle komhlaba, kodwa ngendlela ehlukile kunokuba yonke into emhlabeni ihambe, futhi kulolu hlobo kuyinguquko yansuku zonke. Ngakho lokhu kubonakala kuthinta yonke indalo, okungukuthi, yonke into engaphandle komhlaba ngaphandle komhlaba owodwa uqobo. Uma, nokho, umuntu kufanele avume ukuthi lokhu kunyakaza kwakungeyona into engavamile emazulwini, kodwa ukuthi umhlaba wawujikeleza usuka entshonalanga uye empumalanga, futhi uma lokhu kwakubhekwa ngokucophelela maqondana nokuphuma nokushona kwelanga okubonakalayo, inyanga nezinkanyezi, kwakuzotholakala ukuthi lesi kwakuyisimo sangempela."
UNicolas Copernicus, Izinguquko Zemizimba Yasezulwini, 1543
Isiqephu singasetshenziswa njengobufakazi bokuthi uCopernicus wayehlukile kwizazi zefilosofi zemvelo zendabuko, ze-Aristotelian zosuku lwakhe ngoba wasikisela ukuthi
A.i-cosmos iyindilinga
B.uMhlaba uyindilinga

GivenAnswer:

Esikhundleni salokho, uphakamisa ukuthi umhlaba uyajikeleza usuka entshonalanga uye empumalanga, okuchaza ukunyakaza kwelanga, inyanga nezinkanyezi okubonwayo. Lokhu kwehlukile kakhulu nombono we-Aristotelian wokuthi umhlaba umile.

Ezinye izinketho azilungile ngoba:

B. Naye uyavumelana ukuthi umhlaba uyindilinga 
C. Akasho lutho ngokuthi i-cosmos i-geostatic

Ngakho-ke umehluko omkhulu phakathi kukaCopernicus ne-Aristotelian ukuthi uCopernicus waphakamisa ukuthi umhlaba awumile kodwa uyanyakaza.

Question:
Ukuguqulwa okubangela i-achondroplasia kusebenza umphumela ongahlukaniswa ngokuthi:
A.okubi okubusayo.
B.inzuzo-of-umsebenzi.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.ukulahlekelwa-of-umsebenzi.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo eyiqiniso ithi A. okubi okubusayo.

I-achondroplasia ibangelwa ukuguqulwa kwe-FGFR3 gene, okwenza umphumela wokubi okubusayo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuguqulwa kwegene kuholela ekukhiqizweni kwe-FGFR3 protein engasebenzi kahle futhi ivimbela ukukhula kwamathambo ngendlela efanele. 

Eminye imininingwane:
- Akuyona inzuzo-of-umsebenzi (B) ngoba umphumela awuthuthukisi umsebenzi we-FGFR3.
- Akusiyona i-haploinsufficiency (C) ngoba isimo asidingeki ukuthi kube khona ikhophi elungile ye-FGFR3 gene. 
- Akulona ukulahlekelwa-of-umsebenzi (D) ngoba i-FGFR3 protein ikhona kodwa ayisebenzi ngendlela efanele.

Ngakho-ke, ukuguqulwa kwe-FGFR3 gene kusebenza ngokubi okubusayo ukubangela i-achondroplasia.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okwenza ukunquma ukuhlobana kokuziphendukela kwemvelo kwezinhlobo ezahlukene ngokusekelwe ngokulandelana kwe-amino acid yamaprotheni e-homologous ngokuvamile okunembile kunokuzimisela kokuhlobene okusekelwe ekulandeleni kwe-nucleotide yezakhi zofuzo ze-homologous?
A.Ukuguqulwa buthule
B.Gene duplications
C.Izenzakalo ze-Translocation ezishintsha ukulandelana kwezakhi zofuzo
D.Ukuwela-phezu
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ithi A. Ukuguqulwa buthule.

Ukuguqulwa buthule kuyizinguquko ezincane ekulandelaneni kwe-nucleotide ezingaholeli ekushintsheni i-amino acid eprotheni. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kuhlale kufana isikhathi eside kunokulandelana kwe-nucleotide.

Izizathu ezenza ukuthi okunye okushiwo kungabi yimpendulo:

B. Gene duplications - Lokhu kungadala ukuthi kube khona amaprotheni amaningi kodwa akushintshi ukulandelana kwawo kwe-amino acid.

C. Izenzakalo ze-Translocation - Lokhu kungashintsha indawo yamagene kodwa akushintshi ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kuwo amaprotheni.

D. Ukuwela-phezu - Lokhu kungashintsha ukulandelana kwe-nucleotide kodwa akuvamile ukuthi kushinsthe ukulandelana kwe-amino acid eprotheni.

Ngakho-ke, ukuguqulwa buthule yikona okugcina ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kufana isikhathi eside, okwenza kube wuphawu olungcono lokuhlaziya ukuhlobana kunokulandelana kwe-nucleotide.

Question:
Ithangi lisesimweni se-prism engunxantathu. Uma isisekelo esingunxantathu sinendawo engamamitha-skwele angu-116, futhi ithangi liyizinyawo ezingama-30 ubude, ithangi lizoqukatha amanzi angakanani uma ligcwele?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Kulesi simo, sinayo i-prism engunxantathu enendawo yesisekelo engamamitha-skwele angu-116 kanye nobude obuyizinyawo ezingama-30. Ukuze sithole ukuthi ithangi lizoqukatha amanzi angakanani uma ligcwele, sidinga ukusebenzisa ifomu yevolumu ye-prism.

Ifomu yevolumu ye-prism:
Volume = Indawo yesisekelo × Ubude

Okokuqala, sidinga ukuguqula amamitha-skwele abe ama-square feet:
1 m^2 = 10.7639 ft^2
116 m^2 = 116 × 10.7639 = 1248.6124 ft^2

Manje, asisebenzise ifomu yevolumu ye-prism:
Volume = 1248.6124 ft^2 × 30 ft
            = 37458.372 ft^3

Impendulo engacacile kulezi ezibekiwe, kodwa ake sibheke ngamunye:

A. 1725 ft^3 - Akuyona impendulo efanele
B. 1740 ft^3 - Akuyona impendulo efanele
C. 3480 ft^3 - Akuyona impendulo efanele
D. 6960 ft^3 - Akuyona impendulo efanele

Ngakho-ke, ayikho impendulo efanele kulezi ezibekiwe. Impendulo efanele kufanele ibe u-37458.372 ft^3 noma cishe u-37500 ft^3 uma siyibeka ngokusondele.

Question:

Question:
Abantu abadala abaneminyaka ephakathi babonakala bengaphezu ____ kunabantu abadala noma abancane
A.Generative
B.Neurotic
C.Kuyavumelana
D.Ngokuqinisekile
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele ngeyokuthi C. Kuyavumelana.

Abantu abadala abaneminyaka ephakathi (middle-aged) babonakala bengaphezu kokuvumelana (agreeable) kunabantu abadala kakhulu noma abancane kakhulu. 

Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu abaseminyakeni ephakathi baye babe nokubambisana, ukubekezela, nokuqonda kangcono kunalabo abasebancane kakhulu noma abadala kakhulu. Kungenzeka ukuthi abantu abaseminyakeni ephakathi sebenolwazi nokuqonda okungcono ngempilo nokubhekana nabanye abantu.

Izimpendulo ezinye aziqondene kangako:

- Generative - kusho ukukhiqiza noma ukwenza okuthile okusha, akuhambisani ncamashi nokuphendula
- Neurotic - kusho ukuba nokungaqiniseki emoyeni noma ukuhlukumezeka, akuhambisani
- Ngokuqinisekile - kusho ukwenza okuthile ngokungangabazeki, kodwa akuyona impendulo efanele lapha

Ngakho-ke impendulo C. Kuyavumelana iyona efanele kakhulu kulesi sitatimende.

Question:
Leli thuluzi lokumaketha nokuxhumana linikeza isikhuthazo esiqondile noma isikhuthazo sokukhuthaza amakhasimende ukuthi athenge umkhiqizo / insizakalo:
A.Ukukhangisa.
B.Ubudlelwane bomphakathi.
C.Ukukhuthazwa kokuthengisa.
D.Ukumaketha okuqondile.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kakhulu kulezi ezibekiwe is C. Ukukhuthazwa kokuthengisa.

Ukukhuthazwa kokuthengisa (sales promotion) kuhlanganisa izinhlelo ezihlukahlukene zesikhashana ezihlose ukukhuthaza amakhasimende ukuthi athenge umkhiqizo noma insizakalo ngokushesha. Lokhu kungabandakanya izaphulelo, imiklomelo, imivuzo, nokunye okunikeza isikhuthazo esiqondile sokuthengisa.

Ezinye izinketho:
A. Ukukhangisa - Nakuba kubalulekile ekwaziseni nasekugqugquzeleni ukuthengwa komkhiqizo, awunikezi isikhuthazo esiqondile sokuthengisa.
B. Ubudlelwane bomphakathi - Buhlose ukwakha isithunzi sebhizinisi nokuxhumana nomphakathi, hhayi ukukhuthaza ukuthengwa komkhiqizo ngqo. 
D. Ukukhangisa okuqondile - Nakuba kuxhumana ngqo namakhasimende, akuvamile ukunikeza izikhuthazo eziqondile zokuthengisa.

Ngakho-ke, ukukhuthazwa kokuthengisa yizona zindlela eziqondene kakhulu nokunikeza izikhuthazo zokuthengisa umkhiqizo noma insizakalo ngokushesha.

Question:
I-autocorrelation engemihle esele iboniswa ukuthi yikuphi okulandelayo?
A.Iphethini ye-cyclical ku-residuals
B.Iphethini eshintshashintshayo ezinsalela
C.Ukungahleliwe okuphelele kuma-residuals
D.Izinsalela zonke eziseduze ne-zero
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele umbuzo wakho ithi:

A. Iphethini ye-cyclical ku-residuals

I-autocorrelation ivamise ukubonisa iphethini ye-cyclical ezinsalela (residuals). Lokhu kusho ukuthi izinsalela zixhumene noma zincike kwezinye ezedlule ngendlela elandelanayo noma ye-cyclical. 

Izimpendulo ezinye aziqondile ngalezi zizathu:

B. Iphethini eshintshashintshayo ezinsalela - Lena ayiyona impendulo efanele ngoba i-autocorrelation ibonisa iphethini eqondile ye-cyclical, hhayi nje ukushintshashintsha okungahleliwe.

C. Ukungahleliwe okuphelele kuma-residuals - Lena ayiyona impendulo ngoba i-autocorrelation ibonisa ukuhleleka okuthile, hhayi ukungahleleki okugcwele. 

D. Izinsalela zonke eziseduze ne-zero - Nakuba izinsalela ezixhumaniswe ne-autocorrelation zingaba seduze no-0, lokhu akuyona into eyenzeka njalo futhi akuyona eyona nkomba ebalulekile ye-autocorrelation.

Ngakho-ke, iphethini ye-cyclical ezinsalela iyona mpendulo efanele mayelana nokuthi i-autocorrelation iboniswa yini.

Question:
Yiziphi kulezi zici ezilandelayo ngokuvamile ezihambisana nokudlwengula usuku?
A.ukusetshenziswa kwamandla ngokweqile
B.Premeditated

D.kuhilela ukusetshenziswa kwesikhali
GivenAnswer:

Ukudlwengula usuku kuvame ukuhambisana nokugqugquzelwa ngokocansi komuntu odlwengulayo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umuntu ukhuthazwa noma ukhuthazwa ukwenza ucansi ngenxa yokubona noma ukucabanga okuthile okumnandi ngokocansi. 

Ezinye izici ezingase zihambisane nokudlwengula usuku kodwa hhayi njalo:

- Ukusetshenziswa kwamandla, kodwa hhayi ngokweqile njengoba kungekho zilimalo ezinkulu ezenzekayo. 
- Ukuhlelwa kwesenzo, kodwa kaningi kuyinto eyenzeka ngephutha ngenxa yokugqugquzelwa okukhulu.
- Ukusetshenziswa kwesikhali akujwayelekile kodwa kungenzeka uma umuntu enokwesaba.

Ngakho-ke yize okunye kulokhu kungase kube khona, okubaluleke kakhulu nokugqamile ekudlwengulweni kosuku ukugqugquzelwa okukhulu ngokocansi okwenza umuntu alahlekelwe ukuzibamba.

Question:
Abafundi baqhuba ukuzivocavoca kokuhlukaniswa kwe-pigment yezitshalo okudinga ukuthi basebenzise igumbi le-chromatography elivaliwe elinenani elincane le-acetone ezansi kwekamelo. Izixwayiso zokuphepha ze-acetone zihlanganisa isitatimende sokuthi i-eye and skin irritant futhi ine-vapors evuthayo. Kulokhu okulandelayo' yiziphi izinyathelo zokuphepha okufanele abafundi bazithathele ngenkathi beqhuba ukuzivocavoca?
A.Ukubeka amagilavu abuyisela umlilo ukuthwala igumbi ku-hood fume uma i-acetone ibamba umlilo
B.Ukubeka igumbi kwikhabhinethi evaliwe, emnyama isikhathi sokuhlukaniswa kwe-pigment
C.Ukugqoka amagilavu esikhumba nokumboza ikhala nomlomo nge-particle mask
D.Ukugqoka izibuko namagilavu ohlobo lwe-nitrile nokugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kakhulu kulezi ezibekiwe ukuthi abafundi kufanele bathathele lezi zinyathelo zokuphepha ezilandelayo ngenkathi beqhuba ukuzivocavoca:

D. Ukugqoka izibuko namagilavu ohlobo lwe-nitrile nokugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe

Izizathu:

1. Njengoba i-acetone iyinto edala ukuhlaselwa kwamehlo nesikhumba, ukugqoka izibuko namagilavu e-nitrile kuzovikela amehlo nesikhumba sabafundi ekuthintaneni ne-acetone ngqo.

2. Ukugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe kuzosiza ukunciphisa ukubhebhetheka kwe-acetone emoyeni, ngaleyo ndlela kunciphisa ubungozi bokuvutha kwe-vapors ye-acetone.

3. Ukubeka igumbi kwikhabhinethi evaliwe, emnyama (B) akuyona impendulo efanele ngoba lokhu akuvikeli abafundi ekuthintaneni ne-acetone.

4. Ukubeka amagilavu abuyisela umlilo (A) kungaba wusizo uma i-acetone ibamba umlilo, kodwa akuyona inyathelo lokuqala lokuphepha okufanele abafundi balithathele.

Ngakho-ke, ukugqoka izibuko zokuphepha namagilavu e-nitrile kanye nokugcina izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe yizona zinyathelo ezibaluleke kakhulu zokuphepha abafundi okufanele bazithathele ngenkathi beqhuba lolu kuzivocavoca.

Question:
Ukusebenza kahle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector ngu-0.1. Uma ama-photons angu-100 ethunyelwa ku-detector, enye ngemuva kwenye, umtshina uzothola ama-photons
A.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-4
B.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3
C.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-1
D.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-0.1
GivenAnswer:
Kulesi simo, singasebenzisa ukulinganisela kwe-Poisson ukuze sithole impendulo.

Ukusebenza kahle kwe-detector ngu-p = 0.1
Inani lama-photons ethunyelwe ngu-N = 100

Inani elilindelekile lama-photons atholakele ngu-:
μ = N * p
  = 100 * 0.1
  = 10

Ukuphambuka kwe-rms (root mean square) kwe-Poisson distribution ngu-:
σ = √μ
  = √10
  = 3.16 (cishe okungu-3)

Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiqiniso ithi:
B. isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3

Question:
Isitatimende 1 | Eqenjini (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Isitatimende 2 | Eqenjini (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Yiqiniso, Yiqiniso
B.Amanga, Amanga
C.Yiqiniso, Amanga
D.Amanga, Yiqiniso
GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlaziye isitatimende ngasinye:

Isitatimende 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}

Imithetho yamandla ithi:
(ab)^n = a^n * b^n

Kodwa uma n ingunombolo onegative, sithola:
(ab)^{-n} = (a^{-1} * b^{-1})^n = (a^{-1})^n * (b^{-1})^n = a^{-n} * b^{-n}

Ngakho-ke, (ab)^{-2} = a^{-2} * b^{-2}, HHAYI b^{-2} * a^{-2}

Ngakho, isitatimende 1 ASIYONA iqiniso.

Isitatimende 2: (ab)^n = a^n * b^n

Lokhu KUYIQINISO, njengoba siboniswe ngenhla.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ithi:
D. Amanga, Yiqiniso

Ukuze sithole impendulo, masihlukanise le nkinga ngezinyathelo ezimbalwa.

Isinyathelo 1: Qala nge-fraction engaphakathi, $\frac{1}{-3}$. Lokhu kufana no $-\frac{1}{3}$.

Isinyathelo 2: Manje, masibheke i-complex fraction, $\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}$. Lokhu kufana no $\cfrac{1}{-\frac{1}{3}}$. Ukuze sikhiphe isibalo, siphendula ngokuphambene ne-denominator:

$\cfrac{1}{-\frac{1}{3}} = 1 \cdot (-\frac{1}{3})^{-1} = -3$

Isinyathelo 3: Manje, sesithole $-\frac{1}{3} \cdot (-3)$.

$-\frac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = 1$

Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiqiniso ithi A. 1.

Question:
Ukungasizi okufundiwe kungenzeka kakhulu ukuthi kuhlobene ngqo
A.umphumela weBarnem.
B.ukukhetha ukuzikhonza.
C.i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula.
D.ukunaka okuhle okungenamibandela.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ingaba i-C, i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula.

I-locus yokulawula ichaza ukuthi abantu bakholelwa kangakanani ukuthi imiphumela yempilo yabo ilawulwa yizimo zangaphandle (njenge-locus yangaphandle yokulawula) noma izenzo zabo (i-locus yangaphakathi yokulawula).

Abantu abanendawo yangaphandle yokulawula bakholelwa ukuthi izinto ezenzeka kubo zilawulwa amandla angaphandle kwabo, njengethuba, inhlanhla, noma abanye abantu. Kungenzeka ukuthi bakholelwe ukuthi abanawo amandla okushintsha isimo sabo noma ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabo.

Ngakho-ke, ukungasebenzisi okufundiwe kungahlobana ne-locus yangaphandle yokulawula ngoba abantu abakholelwa ukuthi abanawo amandla phezu kwemiphumela yabo bangase bangaboni isidingo sokusebenzisa ulwazi abaluzuzile ukuze bathuthukise izimpilo zabo.

Question:
Yimaphi amasethi alandelayo wezintambo ze-bit AYIKWAZI ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile?
A.Zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five
B.Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye
C.Zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros
D.Zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile yi B: Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye.

Isizathu:
- Isethi A (zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five) lingachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Isibonelo, inkulumo "0*1(00000)*0*1*" ichaza lesi sethi.
- Isethi C (zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros) nayo ingachazwa ngenkulumo efana no "(0*10*10*)*".  
- Isethi D (zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros) nayo ingachazwa, isibonelo "0*1*0+1*".
- Kodwa isethi B (zonke izintambo eziqala nge-0 ziphela nge-1) ayikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Lokhu kubangelwa ukuthi inkulumo ejwayelekile ayikwazi ukukhumbula inani le-bits ukuze iqinisekise ukuthi i-bit yokuqala ne-bit yokugcina ziyafana.

Ngakho-ke impendulo elungile yi B, lesi yisethi ESINGEKE sachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungakhiqiza kakhulu ukukhula komnotho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi?
A.Ukusetshenziswa okusheshayo okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo.
B.Amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala.
C.Isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali.
D.Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile kakhulu kulezi ezinikeziwe ingaba C: Isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali.

Izizathu:

1. Isitoko sezimpahla zemali siwumthombo wezimali zokutshala izimali nokwandisa umnotho. Ngokwandisa ukutshala izimali, kukhula umkhiqizo, amathuba emisebenzi, kanye nempilo yabantu.

2. Ukusetshenziswa okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo kungaholela ekuncipheni kwemithombo esikhathini esizayo, okungase kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekukhuleni komnotho.

3. Amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala angase ahambisane namazinga aphansi emakhono nokusebenza, okungase kuvimbele ukukhula komnotho.

4. Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali zingase zivimbele ukutshala izimali nokwandisa umnotho, njengoba abantu bezama ukugwema intela.

Ngakho-ke, isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali singumthombo obalulekile wezimali zokutshala izimali nokwandisa umnotho, okungaholela ekukhuleni okunamandla komnotho ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

Question:

Question:
Ucwaningo lukaGarcia noKoelling mayelana nokucasulwa okufundiwe lwasungula ukuthi yimaphi amabhangqa alandelayo e-UCS ne-CS anamandla kakhulu futhi afundwe ngokushesha kakhulu?
A.ukwenza umsebenzi nokuthola umvuzo wokudla
B.isicanucanu nokudla noma isiphuzo
C.ukunyakaza nokushaqeka
D.izijeziso nemivuzo
GivenAnswer:

Kulolu cwaningo, amaphoyisa ayenikwa isicanucanu bese enikezwa ukudla. Ngemuva kokwenza lokhu kaningi, iphoyisa laliqala ukukhipha amathe uma lizwa isicanucanu ngisho lingakatholi ukudla. Lokhu kwakubonisa ukuthi iphoyisa lase lifundiswe ukuxhumanisa isicanucanu nokudla, okusho ukuthi isicanucanu sase siyisiqalo esikhombisa ukudla (okuyinto eyayidingeka).

Question:
Yini igama lokuthi ukuncintisana kwelinye izwe kuthonywa kangakanani ukuncintisana kwamanye amazwe?
A.Ukuhweba kwamazwe ngamazwe
B.Umnotho womhlaba wonke
C.Ukuncintisana komhlaba wonke
D.Globalisation
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kakhulu kulemibuzo ngenhla ithi "D. Globalisation".

Igama "globalisation" lisho inqubo lapho amazwe omhlaba ehlanganiswa khona ngokwezomnotho, ezepolitiki, ezamasiko kanye nezinye izindlela zokuxhumana. Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukwanda kokuhwebelana, ukutshala izimali phakathi kwamazwe, ukusabalala kwezindlela zokuxhumana ezifana ne-internet, kanye nokwanda kokuhamba kwabantu phakathi kwamazwe.

Ngakho-ke, ukuncintisana komhlaba wonke (global competition) kuthonywa kakhulu yi-globalisation ngoba:

1. Amazwe asencintisaneni yokudayisa imikhiqizo yawo emakethe womhlaba wonke.
2. Izinkampani ziphequlula amathuba wokutshala izimali emazweni angaphandle ukuze zikwazi ukuncintisana kangcono emhlabeni wonke. 
3. Ukusabalala kolwazi nobuchwepheshe kunikeza amazwe amathuba amasha okuncintisana.

Ngakho-ke, ukuncintisana komhlaba wonke kuxhumene ngqo ne-globalisation njengoba amazwe nezinkampani ezahlukene zizama ukuncintisana emakethe womhlaba wonke ohlanganisiwe.

Question:
Iqiniso lokuthi imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-deuterium chloride (DCl) ishintshwa kuleyo ye-hydrogen chloride (HCl) kungenxa yomehluko wabo
A.ukusatshalaliswa kwe-electron
B.dipole mzuzu
C.amandla njalo
D.mass encishisiwe
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ithi D. mass encishisiwe.

Iqiniso lokuthi imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-deuterium chloride (DCl) ishintshwa kuleyo ye-hydrogen chloride (HCl) kungenxa yomehluko wabo wemass encishisiwe.

Chaza:
- I-deuterium chloride (DCl) ne-hydrogen chloride (HCl) zinezakhiwo ezifanayo kodwa i-DCl iqukethe i-isotope ye-hydrogen esindayo, i-deuterium, esikhundleni se-protium (i-hydrogen evamile).
- Ngenxa yemass ethe xaxa ye-deuterium, i-DCl inesisindo esithe xaxa kune-HCl.
- Lokhu kwenza ukuthi i-DCl ibe nemvamisa ephansi yokudlidliza kunaleyo ye-HCl.
- Ngakho-ke, imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-DCl ishintshwa kuleyo ye-HCl ngenxa yomehluko wabo wemass encishisiwe.

Ezinye izinketho azilungile ngoba:
- Ukusatshalaliswa kwe-electron, i-dipole moment namandla e-bond kufana ku-DCl nakuya-HCl njengoba izakhiwo zazo ziyafana.

Question:
Thola ubude be-curve y = ln x phakathi kwamaphuzu lapho y = 1/2 no-y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Kulungile, ake sisebenzise i-formula yobude be-curve ukuze sithole impendulo.

Ubude be-curve y = f(x) phakathi kwa-a no-b bunikezwa yi-formula:

L = ∫ₐᵇ √(1 + [f'(x)]²) dx

Lapha, f(x) = ln x, ngakho-ke f'(x) = 1/x.

Amaphuzu lapho y = 1/2 no-y = 1:
- Uma y = 1/2, ln x = 1/2, ngakho-ke x = e^(1/2) ≈ 1.649
- Uma y = 1, ln x = 1, ngakho-ke x = e ≈ 2.718

Manje, ake sisebenzise la maphuzu ku-formula:

L = ∫₁.₆₄₉^2.718 √(1 + [1/x]²) dx

    = ∫₁.₆₄₉^2.718 √(1 + 1/x²) dx

    = [x √(1 + 1/x²) + ln|x + √(x² + 1)|]₁.₆₄₉^2.718

    ≈ 2.718 √(1 + 1/2.718²) + ln|2.718 + √(2.718² + 1)| 
      - 1.649 √(1 + 1/1.649²) - ln|1.649 + √(1.649² + 1)|

    ≈ 1.18

Ngakho-ke, impendulo eyiqiniso ithi C. 1.18.

Question:
Kuyini ukuhlaselwa kabusha?
A.Lapho umhlaseli ephendula umyalezo othunyelwe kuwo uhlelo
B.Ukuhlaselwa okuphindaphinda ngokuqhubekayo, ukuhlola ubuthakathaka
C.Ukuhlaselwa okusebenzisa imiyalezo yesistimu uqobo futhi ngakho-ke akukwazi ukuvikela
D.Umhlaseli uthumela kabusha umyalezo obanjwe, futhi isayithi lamukela futhi liphendula ngokuthanda komhlaseli
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile yi B. Ukuhlaselwa kabusha (replay attack) kusho ukuhlaselwa okuphindaphinda ngokuqhubekayo, lapho umhlaseli ehlola ubuthakathaka besistimu ngokuthumela kabusha imiyalezo noma izicelo ezibanjwe ngaphambilini.

Eminye imininingwane:
- Umhlaseli ubamba imiyalezo noma izicelo ezithunyelwe phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezimbili bese eziphinda kabusha ngemuva kwesikhathi.
- Inhloso ukuthola ubuthakathaka obukhona ohlelweni noma ukudlulela ngaphakathi kwezindlela zokuvikela.
- Ukuhlaselwa kabusha akusho ukuphendula umyalezo (A) noma ukusebenzisa imiyalezo yesistimu (C).
- Umhlaseli akagxili ekuthumeleni kabusha umyalezo obanjwe ukuze isayithi liphendule ngokuthanda kwawo (D), kodwa ukuhlola amaphuzu obuthakathaka.

Ngakho-ke impendulo B iyona echaza kahle kakhulu ukuhlaselwa kabusha - ukuhlasela ngokuphindaphinda ngenhloso yokuhlola ubuthakathaka besistimu.

Question:
Yimuphi umbono wengqondo owawuthandwa kakhulu ekuqaleni kwekhulu lamashumi amabili eNtshonalanga Yurophu?
A.neuroscience
B.ukuziphendukela kwemvelo
C.behaviorist
D.psychoanalytic
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwekhulu lamashumi amabini eNtshonalanga Yurophu, umbono wengqondo owawuthandwa kakhulu ekuqaleni kwalelo khulu yayingumbono we-psychoanalytic.

Umbono we-psychoanalytic waqaliswa nguSigmund Freud ekupheleni kwekhulu elidlulileyo waze waqhubeka ukuba nodumo olukhulu kuqala kwekhulu lamashumi amabini, ingakumbi eNtshonalanga Yurophu. 

Lo mbono ugxininisa ukubaluleka kwemiba yengqondo engaphantsi (unconscious mind), imiyalezo yesini kunye neenkumbulo zomntwana ezinefuthe elikhulu ekuziphatheni nasekwakheni ubuqu bomntu. Ngokuka Freud, iingxaki zengqondo zibangwa ziingxaki ezingasonjululwanga zomntwana ezivaleleke engqondweni engaphantsi.

Nangona eminye imibono efana ne-behaviorism yayikhona ngelo xesha, umbono we-psychoanalytic ngowona wawunamandla nofundiswa kakhulu eNtshonalanga Yurophu ekuqaleni kwekhulu lamashumi amabini. Ngoko ke impendulo echanekileyo ngu-(D) psychoanalytic.

Question:
Esikhathini xy-indiza, igrafu x ^ (log y) = y ^ log x kuyinto
A.i-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
B.ijika elivaliwe
C.i-ray ku-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
D.iphuzu elilodwa
GivenAnswer:
Kulungile, masicubungule le nkinga ngokubheka izici zomfanekiso wegraph ye x^(log y) = y^(log x).

1. Qaphela ukuthi x > 0 futhi y > 0 ngoba i-logarithm ayichaziwe ngamanani anganeno kuka-0.

2. Uma x = 1, x^(log y) = 1^(log y) = 1 for noma iyiphi i-y. Ngakho-ke, umdwebo udlula ku-(1, y) for noma iyiphi i-y.

3. Uma y = 1, y^(log x) = 1^(log x) = 1 for noma iyiphi i-x. Ngakho-ke, umdwebo udlula ku-(x, 1) for noma iyiphi i-x.

4. Uma x = y, x^(log x) = x^(log x). Lokhu kuyiqiniso for noma iyiphi i-x > 0. Ngakho-ke, umdwebo udlula ku-(x, x) for noma iyiphi i-x > 0.

5. Ngenxa yalezi zici, singabona ukuthi umdwebo uyimigqa emibili eku-quadrant yokuqala, eyodwa ngaphezulu kwe-y = x futhi enye ngaphansi kwe-y = x.

6. Lawa mageba womabili avulekile ngoba awanaso isiphetho ku-x noma i-y axis, futhi awagobeli ndawo.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ithi A: i-quadrant yokuqala evulekile.

Question:
Intela ebekwe kumphakeli cishe izodluliselwa kumthengi ngendlela yokwenyuka kwentengo uma
A.intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.
B.ukuqina kwentengo yokufunwa kuyi-inelastic kakhulu.
C.intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto iyunithi nokunwebeka.
D.umholo nokunwebeka kwesidingo kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ithi B. Ukuqina kwentengo yokufunwa kuyi-inelastic kakhulu.

Uma intengo nokunwebeka kwesidingo kuyi-inelastic kakhulu, kusho ukuthi ushintsho entengo alunayo imiphumela emikhulu ekufunweni komkhiqizo. Ngakho-ke, uma intengo yenyuka, isidingo asiguquki kakhulu futhi abathengi bazoqhubeka nokukuthenga cishe ngezinga elifanayo. Lokhu kwenza kube lula kubakhiqizi ukudlulisela intela kubathengi ngokwenyusa intengo ngoba bayazi ukuthi isidingo sizohlala siqinile.

Ezinye izindlela:

Question:
Ukuhamba ngesivinini sokuqala se-1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m / s, i-proton ingena esifundeni se-magnetic field njalo yobukhulu be-1.5 T. Uma i-vector yokuqala ye-velocity ye-proton yenza i-angle ye-30 ° nge-magnetic field, bala ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m / s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m / s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m / s
GivenAnswer:
Kulesi simo, i-proton ingena esifundeni se-magnetic field nge-velocity yokuqala ye-1.5 × 10^6 m/s futhi yenza i-angle ye-30° ne-magnetic field. Sizosebenzisa umthetho we-Lorentz force ukuthola ijubane le-proton ngemuva kwesikhathi esithile.

I-Lorentz force inikezwa ngu-F = qv × B, lapho i-q iyishaji le-proton, i-v iyijubane, futhi i-B iyinani le-magnetic field.

Ngoba i-angle phakathi kwe-velocity vector ne-magnetic field iyi-30°, singahlukanisa i-velocity vector ibe yizingxenye ezimbili:
v_parallel = v * cos(30°) = 1.5 × 10^6 * cos(30°) = 1.3 × 10^6 m/s
v_perpendicular = v * sin(30°) = 1.5 × 10^6 * sin(30°) = 7.5 × 10^5 m/s

I-component eparallel ye-velocity ngeke ishintshwe yi-magnetic field. Kepha, i-perpendicular component izokhiqiza i-circular motion ngenxa ye-Lorentz force.

I-rediasi ye-circular motion inikezwa ngu-r = mv_perpendicular / (qB), lapho i-m iyimass ye-proton.

Manje, asikwazi ukubala isivinini se-angular se-proton using ω = v_perpendicular / r = qB / m. Ngakho-ke, ngemuva kwesikhathi t = 4s, i-angle ephendukile iyoba yi-θ = ωt.

Ekugcineni, ijubane lokuqala liyoba:
v_final = sqrt((v_parallel)^2 + (v_perpendicular)^2) = sqrt((1.3 × 10^6)^2 + (7.5 × 10^5)^2) = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Ngakho-ke, ijubane le-proton ngemuva kwe-4s lisafana nejubane lokuqala, okuyimpendulo **C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s**.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

- Lokhu akulona iqiniso. I-glycolysis idinga i-NAD+ kunokuba kube yi-NADP+.

Question:
Ukuzivumelanisa nezitshalo ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi ezindaweni ezinamazinga okushisa aphezulu kufaka phakathi yikuphi okulandelayo?
A.Stomata eziningi
B.Ama-cuticles amancane

D.Izilinganiso ezinkulu ze-surface-to-volume
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi ezitshalo ezindaweni ezinokushisa okuphezulu ngu-D: Izilinganiso ezinkulu ze-surface-to-volume.

Ngakho-ke ukunika izitshalo izilinganiso ezinkulu ze-surface-to-volume (okusho ukuthi umzimba omncane kodwa indawo enkulu yangaphakathi) kuzisiza zigcine amanzi kangcono kunokuba zibe namaqabunga amakhulu avulekile.

- Ama-cuticles amakhulu (hhayi amancane) angavikela ukulahleka kwamanzi
- Ama-stomata ambalwa (hhayi amaningi) anganciphisa ukuphuma kwamanzi

Question:
Lo mgunyathi unomthetho wobugebengu olandelayo osebenzayo:"Umuntu akanacala lokuziphatha ngobugebengu uma ngesikhathi sokuziphatha okunjalo, ngenxa yesifo sengqondo noma ukukhubazeka, engenawo amandla amakhulu okubonga ububi bokuziphatha kwakhe, noma ukuhambisana nokuziphatha kwakhe nezidingo zomthetho. " Ngelinye ilanga ntambama, umsolwa wayegada umshana wakhe oneminyaka emihlanu ubudala. Question:
Umuntu obhalayo ungumuntu waseMexico-waseMelika futhi unombono wokuthi udinga ukuvota okukhulu kwabavoti baseMexico ukuze anqobe ukhetho. Ngenxa yalokho, umphathi wakhe womkhankaso, unquma ukuthumela ngeposi kuwo wonke umvoti obhalisiwe waseMexico isitikha esikhalisa unyembezi, esinegama lomuntu ozobhapathizwa kanye nehhovisi agijima kulo. Njengoba abantu abaningi bomdabu baseMexico bengekho ubuchule ekufundeni nasekubhaleni isiNgisi, umphathi womkhankaso ukholelwa ukuthi abavoti abaningi bazoba nobunzima bokubhala igama nehhovisi lomuntu ozobhapathizwa ku-voti. Ngenxa yalokho, umphathi womkhankaso ugibele umkhankaso omkhulu wezindaba wokwazisa abavoti ngendlela yokusebenzisa izitikha ku-voti. Ezinyangeni ezinhlanu ngaphambi kokhetho isikhulu sokhetho kwazisa ikomidi lomkhankaso womuntu ozobhapathizwa ukuthi izitikha zokuklebhula azihambisani nomthetho wombuso. Encwadini yakhe, lesi sikhulu sichaza ukuthi izikhulu zokhetho zombuso banombono wokuthi kuyadingeka ukuthi abavoti abangaba khona babhale igama lomuntu ozobhapathizwa ngoyinki. Ngakho-ke, uphetha ngokuthi izitika azihambisani nezidingo ezisemthethweni. Ngemva kwamasonto amathathu, lowo ozobhapathizwa wafaka icala enkantolo yesifunda yase-federal ngokumelene nezikhulu zokhetho zombuso ethi ukutolika kwabo umthetho wombuso kwephula uMthethosisekelo wase-US. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo, uma kusungulwe, okubeka impikiswano eqinile yomthethosisekelo esekela ukuhunyushwa kwesikhulu sokhetho komthetho?
A.Ukuvota kwabavoti phakathi kwabavoti ababhalisiwe baseMexico baseMelika abangenalo ubuchule ngesiNgisi kuye kwaba ngaphansi kwe-1% yenani lonke lombuso okhethweni lwamuva.
B.Umthetho wombuso udinga ukuthi idokodo ngalinye lokuvota lifakwe ipeni le-inki ukuze kube lula ukubhalwa kwamavoti.
C.Njengoba inani elikhulu lamavoti okubhala ngokuvamile likhulisa isikhathi esidingekayo ukubala wonke amavoti, kuyadingeka ukufaka amavoti anjalo ngendlela efanayo.
D.Amandla okukhwabanisa ukuvota makhulu kakhulu ngezitika ezishicilelwe ngaphambili.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo D ibeka impikiswano eqinile yomthethosisekelo esekela ukuhunyushwa kwesikhulu sokhetho komthetho.

Amandla okukhwabanisa ukuvota makhulu kakhulu ngezitika ezishicilelwe ngaphambili. Lokhu kusho ukuthi izitika ezishicilelwe ngaphambili zingasetshenziswa kalula ukuze kukhwabaniswe ukuvota, okungaba yingozi enkulu kwinqubo yentando yeningi. 

Ngakho-ke, ukudinga ukuthi abavoti babhale igama lomuntu ozobhapathizwa ngoyinki kungasiza ukunciphisa amathuba okukhwabanisa ukuvota. Lokhu kuyahambisana nomthethosisekelo ngoba kuvikela ubuqotho benqubo yokuvota.

Ezinye izimpendulo azibeki izizathu eziqinile zokusekela ukuhunyushwa komthetho yisikhulu sokhetho:

- Impendulo A ayiqondene nokuhunyushwa komthetho
- Impendulo B nje ichaza okudingwa umthetho, ayisho lutho ngokuhunyushwa kwawo
- Impendulo C imayelana nesikhathi sokubala amavoti, hhayi ubuqotho benqubo yokuvota

Ngakho-ke, impendulo D yiyona kuphela ebeka izizathu eziqinile zokusekela ukuhunyushwa komthetho yisikhulu sokhetho.

Question:
Inhlangano yezindlu eyayinepheshana lomhlaba. Inhlangano yezindlu yalungiselela uhlelo lokuthuthukisa ukuhlukanisa umhlaba ube yizindawo eziyi-100 nokudala umphakathi wendawo yokuhlala kuleli pheshana. I-Declaration of Covenants yadala inhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu, inhlangano yokuphatha eyayizophatha futhi iphoqelele imithetho nemikhawulo ekhonjwe phakathi kwezivumelwano. Enye yemikhawulo ebekwe ku-Declaration of Covenants ifundeka kanje:"Akusoze nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kumiswe, kuvunyelwe, noma kugcinwe kunoma iyiphi ingxenye yempahla noma yisiphi isakhiwo esenzelwe noma esisetshenziswa njenge-saloon noma indawo yokuthengisa noma ukwenziwa kwe-malt, i-vinous, noma utshwala obunommoya. " I-Declaration of Covenants yaqoshwa ngokufanele futhi yafakwa kwi-deed ethathwe nguthisha lapho ethenga inkatho 62 ekuthuthukiseni. Ngokushesha uthisha waqopha isenzo sakhe. Uthisha waqasha umuzi wakhe kumcwaningi mabhuku isikhathi sonyaka owodwa. Isivumelwano sokuqasha sasibandakanya imikhawulo efanayo naleyo eseSimemezelweni Sezivumelwano nasezenzweni zothisha. Ngokushesha umcwaningi mabhuku waqala ukuthengisa utshwala kule ndawo ngesikhathi samasonto onke "ngemuva kwamahora" amaqembu. Inhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu imangalela umcwaningi mabhuku ngesenzo somonakalo. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyimpikiswano engcono kakhulu kumcwaningi mabhuku?
A.Umthetho ku-Spencer's Case uvimbela umcwaningi mabhuku ukuba abe necala.
B.Umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity yesivumelwano nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu.
C.Umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity of estate nothisha.
D.Ezinye izinto eziningi eziseduze zisetshenziselwa izinjongo zokuhweba.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo engcono kakhulu kumcwaningi mabhuku ukuthi umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity yesivumelwano nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu (B).

Izizathu:

1. I-privity yesivumelwano ikhona phakathi kwamaqembu asayine isivumelwano. Lapha, isivumelwano sasiphakathi kothisha nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu, hhayi umcwaningi mabhuku.

2. Umcwaningi mabhuku uqashe indawo kuthisha, okusho ukuthi unalo i-privity of estate nothisha (C ayilona iqiniso). Kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi unayo i-privity yesivumelwano nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu.

3. Umthetho ku-Spencer's Case (A) awusebenzi lapha ngoba umayelana nezivumelwano zokuqashisa, hhayi izivumelwano zokuthengisa utshwala.

4. Ukuthi ezinye izakhiwo zisetshenziselwa izinjongo zokuhweba (D) akubalulekile lapha ngoba umbuzo umayelana nesivumelwano phakathi kwenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu nomcwaningi mabhuku.

Ngakho-ke, ukungabi khona kwe-privity yesivumelwano phakathi komcwaningi mabhuku nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu kuyisizathu esingcono kakhulu somcwaningi mabhuku ukumelana necala lenhlangano.

Question:
Ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukubhaliswa ekolishi, umbuso unikeza ukukhululwa kwentela ye- $ 200 yentela yombuso kulabo abangabafundi abasebenza ngokugcwele emakolishi ngaphakathi kombuso. Abafundi besifazane abafunda ngesikhathi sokuphumula basavunyelwe ukukhululwa kwentela engu-$100, kanti abafundi besilisa abafunda ngesikhathi sokuphumula abasavumelekile noma yikuphi ukukhululwa kwentela. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okufingqa ngokunembile kakhulu umthetho ofanele womthethosisekelo mayelana nokukhululwa kwentela yombuso kubafundi ababhalisa isikhathi sokuphumula?
A.Ukukhululwa kwentela kuzochithwa njengokwenqatshwa kwenqubo efanele.
B.Ukukhululwa kwentela kuzochithwa njengokwephula isigaba sokuvikela esilinganayo.
C.Isilinganiso sentela sizogcinwa njengangaphakathi kwendawo yenqubo enkulu efanele.
D.Isilinganiso sentela sizogcinwa njengasemandleni kamasipala okuthela amakilasi ahlukene abantu ngokungalingani.
GivenAnswer:
B. Ukukhululwa kwentela kuzochithwa njengokwephula isigaba sokuvikela esilinganayo.

Ngokwesimo esinikeziwe, umbuso unikeza ukukhululwa kwentela okungalingani kubafundi abafunda ngesikhathi sokuphumula ngokususelwa kubulili babo. Lokhu kuyisibonelo esicacile sokubandlulula ngokobulili, okuyinto ephambene nesigaba somthethosisekelo sokuvikelwa okulinganayo.

Ngaphansi kwesigaba sokuvikelwa okulinganayo, uhulumeni kumele aphathane ngokulinganayo nazo zonke izakhamuzi, futhi akanalo ilungelo lokubandlulula noma ukuphatha abantu ngokungafani ngokususelwa kubulili, ubuhlanga, inkolo, noma ezinye izici ezivikelwe. Umehluko phakathi kokuphathwa kwabafundi besifazane nabesilisa lapha awunasizathu esizwakalayo futhi uyisibonelo esicacile sokubandlulula okungavumelekile.

Ngakho-ke, ukukhululwa kwentela okunjalo kungachithwa yinkantolo njengokungahambisani nomthethosisekelo ngaphansi kwesigaba sokuvikelwa okulinganayo.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyiqiniso nge-hypothyroidism?
A.Ukwehla kwesisindo
B.I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial
C.Izinga le-TSH eliphakanyisiwe
D.Ukucasulwa kwezindawo ezifudumele
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo eyiqiniso nge-hypothyroidism kulezi ezibekiwe ngu-C: Izinga le-TSH eliphakanyisiwe.

I-hypothyroidism isho ukusebenza ngaphansi kwenhlenu ye-thyroid, okwenza amahomoni amaningi ahlanganisa i-thyroxine (T4) ne-triiodothyronine (T3) angabi ngokwanele. Lokhu kwenza izinga le-thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) liphakame njengoba umzimba uzama ukukhuthaza inhlenu ye-thyroid ukuthi ikhiqize amahomoni amaningi.

Ngakho-ke, izinga eliphakeme le-TSH liyisimpawu esijwayelekile se-hypothyroidism futhi lisetshenziswa ukuhlola lesi sifo.

Ezinye izimpawu ezingaqondile:

A. Ukwehla kwesisindo - Esikhundleni salokho, i-hypothyroidism ingadala ukukhuluphala ngenxa yokukhiqizwa okuncane kwamahomoni.

B. I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial - Lena ingaba yisimpawu eqhubekayo ye-hypothyroidism engalashwanga, kodwa ayiyona impawu ejwayelekile noma ebalulekile.

D. Ukucasuka kwezindawo ezifudumele - Lesi akusona isimpawu esijwayelekile se-hypothyroidism. Esikhundleni salokho, abantu abanale ndawo bangaba nokuzwela ubandlululo.

Question:
Amanani alinganisiwe ezindlu edolobheni anokusho kwe- $ 125,000 ngokuphambuka okujwayelekile kwe- $ 23,000. Ngenxa yenkontileka yothisha abasha, isifunda sesikole sidinga imali eyengeziwe engu-10% uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule. Ukuqoqa le mali eyengeziwe, idolobha liyalela ihhovisi lokuhlola ukuba liqoqe wonke amanani ezindlu ezilinganisiwe ngo- $ 5,000. Kuyoba yini ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile kwamanani alinganisiwe ezindlu edolobheni?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlaziye imininingwane esinikwe yona:
- Amanani alinganisiwe ezindlu edolobheni anokusho kwe-$125,000.
- Ukuphambuka okujwayelekile kwamanani alinganisiwe kungama-$23,000.
- Isifunda sesikole sidinga imali eyengeziwe engu-10% uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule.
- Ukuqoqa le mali eyengeziwe, idolobha liyalela ihhovisi lokuhlola ukuba liqoqe wonke amanani ezindlu ezilinganisiwe ngo-$5,000.

Ukuthola ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile:

1. Inani elisha elilinganisiwe lezindlu:
   $125,000 + $5,000 = $130,000

2. Ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile kuzoba yiphesenti efanayo yenani elisha elilinganisiwe njengoba kwakunjalo kuqala:
   Ukuphambuka okudala okujwayelekile / Inani elidala elilinganisiwe = Ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile / Inani elisha elilinganisiwe
   $23,000 / $125,000 = Ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile / $130,000
   
3. Siyakwazi ukuxazulula ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile:
   Ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile = ($23,000 / $125,000) × $130,000
                                        = 0.184 × $130,000
                                        = $23,920

Ngakho-ke, ukuphambuka okusha okujwayelekile kwamanani alinganisiwe ezindlu edolobheni kuzoba ama-$23,920, okusondele kakhulu ku-$23,000 kulezi zimpendulo ezibekiwe.

Impendulo eyiyo: A. $23,000

Question:
Ukushayela ngokunganaki komshayeli wemoto kulimale kanzima omunye umshayeli. Umshayeli wemoto wabalwa ngokuhamba emgwaqeni ongalungile futhi wakhokha inhlawulo. Umshayeli wemoto wayenomkhawulo wenqubomgomo we- $ 15,000 kuphela wemfanelo yomuntu wesithathu kwinqubomgomo yakhe yomshuwalense. Ngemuva kokunikeza umshwalense womshayeli wemoto umbiko ogcwele wezokwelapha, zonke izikweletu zezokwelapha, amarekhodi ezokwelapha, kanye nobunye ubufakazi obudingekayo bomonakalo, umsolwa olimele wafuna imingcele yenqubomgomo. Lowo ofake isimangalo wanikeza isaziso sokuthi kuzofakwa isimangalo sokholo olubi uma imingcele yenqubomgomo ingakhokhelwa ngokushesha. Inkampani yomshuwalense yenqaba inkokhelo ngaphandle kwencazelo. Ijaji linikeze umsolwa olimele u-R200 000. Umsolwa olimele wathola isabelo esisayiniwe kumshayeli wemoto onganakile enikeza lowo ofake isimangalo noma yimaphi amalungelo okungenzeka ukuthi umshayeli wemoto wayenawo ngokumelene nomshwalense wakhe. A.Umkhawulo wenqubomgomo ngu- $ 15,000 futhi yilokho kuphela okungaqoqwa ngumuntu olimele akukho okwenziwayo kokukholwa okubi kwinkontileka yomshuwalense.
B.Inkampani yomshuwalense yephule isivumelwano esiqondiwe sokukholwa okuhle nokuphatha ngobulungiswa okucacile kuyo yonke inkontileka yomshuwalense futhi kufanele ikhokhe inani eliphelele lesigwebo.
C.Ukholo olubi luwumuntu siqu eqenjini lomshuwalense kanye nomshuwalense wakhe isabelo sasingasebenzi, futhi umuntu olimele akanaso isimangalo sokuphoqa umshwalense ukuba akhokhe.
D.Iqembu elilimele kumele liphoqelele sonke isinqumo sakhe ngokumelene nomshayeli wemoto futhi lingaze lilandele umshwalense ngaleyo mali.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile kule nkinga yomthetho yilena:

A. Umkhawulo wenqubomgowo ngu-$15,000 futhi yilokho kuphela okungaqoqwa ngumuntu olimele akukho okwenziwayo kokukholwa okubi kwinkontileka yomshuwalense.

Izizathu:

1. Umshwalense unomkhawulo wenqubomgomo we-$15,000 kuphela wemfanelo yomuntu wesithathu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umshwalense awukwazi ukukhokha ngaphezu kwalesi samba ngaphandle kokubheka ukuthi umshwalense wenze okubi yini.

2. Ukuze umshwalense abe necala lokholo olubi, kufanele kube nobufakazi bokuthi umshwalense wenze into engalungile ngokungafanele noma ngenhloso yokulimaza umshwaliswa. Akukho bufakazi obunikeziwe lapha obukhombisa ukuthi umshwalense wenze okubi.

3. Iqiniso lokuthi umshwalense wenqabe ukukhokha imingcele yenqubomgomo ngaphandle kwencazelo akwanele ukubonisa ukholo olubi. Umshwalense unelungelo lokuhlola futhi ucubungule isikhalazo ngaphambi kokukhokha.

4. Isabelo esisayiniwe esinikezwe umuntu olimele asiguquli isimo, njengoba umshwalense engaboshelwa kuphela imingcele yenqubomgomo yakhe.

Ngakho-ke, ngaphansi kwala maqiniso, umuntu olimele angaqoqa kuphela umkhawulo wenqubomgomo we-$15,000 kumshwalense, futhi akukho okwenziwe ukholo olubi okungaphoqa umshwalense ukuba akhokhe inani eliphelele lesigwebo.

Question:

B.I-Eurocentrism iyisitayela sokucabanga lapho ukuhlolwa nokuhlolwa kwemiphakathi engeyona yaseYurophu kubheda ngokuya ngemicabango yamasiko nokukhetha kwabantu baseYurophu.
C.I-Eurocentrism ichaza izifundo noma umsebenzi wezazi ocabangela kuphela izinhlelo zezombusazwe noma zomnotho zaseYurophu.
D.Zonke lezi zinketho.
GivenAnswer:

I-Eurocentrism ibeka amasiko nezinkolelo zaseYurophu njengezisemqoka futhi ziphakeme kunazo zonke ezinye, bese ihlola eminye imiphakathi ngeso laseYurophu. Lokhu kuvame ukuholela ekubukeni phansi nasekwehliseni isithunzi samasiko nezinkolelo zabanye abantu abangeyona ingxenye yaseYurophu.

Question:
Ngaphakathi kwayiphi indawo yokuxhumana nomphakathi okungenzeka ibandakanye ukuloba?
A.Corporate
B.Ubudlelwane bezezimali
C.Izindaba zomphakathi
D.Ibhizinisi ebhizinisini
GivenAnswer:
C. Izindaba zomphakathi

Izindaba zomphakathi zibandakanya ukuxhumana phakathi kwenkampani nomphakathi. Lokhu kungabandakanya ukushicilela izitatimende ezithile, ukubhala imibiko yezindaba, ukuphendula imibuzo yabezindaba, kanye nokulawula izimo zesimo esiphuthumayo. Ukuloba kungaba yingxenye ebalulekile yezindaba zomphakathi ngoba kudingeka ukuxhumana ngendlela ecacile, enembile futhi enomthelela ukuze kuthuthukiswe isithunzi senkampani futhi kugcinwe ubudlelwane obuhle nomphakathi.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuchaza kahle imihlahlandlela yokuziphatha mayelana nokusondelana ngokocansi namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa?

D.Izazi zengqondo azivinjelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa.
GivenAnswer:
B. Izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namakhasimende angaphambili okwelashwa okungenani unyaka owodwa ngemuva kokuqedwa kokwelashwa.

Lokhu kuyiqiniso ngoba imihlahlandlela yokuziphatha yezazi zengqondo iyakuvimbela ukuba nobuhlobo obujulile, kuhlanganise nokocansi, namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa okungenani unyaka owodwa ngemuva kokuqeda ukwelashwa. Lokhu kwenzelwe ukuvikela amaklayenti nokugwema ukuxhashazwa okungenzeka kwenzeke uma kukhona ubudlelwano obusondele kakhulu phakathi kochwepheshe nomuntu owake wayelashwa nguye.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuchaza kahle isimo ngemuva kokuphakanyiswa kwentengo kumkhiqizo onesidingo se-inelastic?
A.Ubuningi obufunwayo ngeke bushintshe.
B.Inani elifunwayo lizokhuphuka.
C.Ingqikithi yemali engenayo izokwehla.
D.Ingqikithi yemali engenayo ngeke ishintshe.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kulezi ezibekiwe ithi:

A. Ubuningi obufunwayo ngeke bushintshe.

Uma umkhiqizo unesidingo esingenakujika (inelastic demand), kusho ukuthi ubuningi obufunwayo abuguquki kakhulu uma intengo iguquka. Ngakho-ke, uma intengo yenyuka, ubuningi obufunwayo buzohlala cishe bulingana.

Ezinye izimpendulo azilungile ngoba:

B. Inani elifunwayo ngeke lenyuke uma intengo inyuka kumkhiqizo onesidingo esingenakujika.

C no D. Ingqikithi yemali engenayo (total revenue) izokwenyuka uma intengo inyuka, ngoba ubuningi obufunwayo abuguquki kakhulu kodwa intengo iba phezulu.

Question:
Ucwaningo nge-etiology yaseSchizophrenia lwabonisa ukuthambekela kwezakhi zofuzo esimweni kodwa ezinye izinto ziyabandakanyeka. Ngokolwazi lwakho lwendaba hlonza ukuthi yiziphi kulezi zitatimende ezilandelayo ezingalungile.
A.I-dopamine eyengeziwe noma ukuzwela ku-dopamine kungaba yinto enegalelo.
B.Iziguli ezimhlophe ziyizimpawu eziningi.

D.Izinga eliphansi le-Schizophrenia elitholakale phakathi kwabantu base-Afrika baseMelika.
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwemininingwane enikeziwe, isitatimende esingalungile kulezi ezilandelayo ngesimo se-Schizophrenia ngu:

B. Iziguli ezimhlophe ziyizimpawu eziningi.

Isizathu salokhu ukuthi ucwaningo alubonisi ukuthi abantu abamhlophe baba nezimpawu eziningi ze-Schizophrenia uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izinhlanga. Empeleni, ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi izinga le-Schizophrenia liphezulu kakhulu phakathi kwabantu base-Afrika baseMelika (isitatimende D), okungukuthi akulona iqiniso ukuthi iziguli ezimhlophe ziyizimpawu eziningi.

Ezinye izitatimende (A, C, kanye no-D) ziyiqiniso ngokwemininingwane enikeziwe.

Question:
Ama-microchips wekhompyutha wanamuhla ngokuyinhloko akhiwa yiliphi isici?
A.Sodium
B.Silicon
C.Aluminium
D.Isiliva
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo eyiqiniso ithi B. Silicon.

Ama-microchips wekhompyutha wanamuhla ngokuyinhloko akhiwa nge-silicon. I-silicon iyisici esijwayelekile kakhulu esisetshenziswa ekwakheni izingxenye ezincane zekhompuyutha ezibizwa ngokuthi ama-microchips noma ama-integrated circuits.

I-silicon isetshenziswa kakhulu ngoba:
- Itholakala kalula futhi iyashibha. 
- Inezici ezifanele ukwakha ama-semiconductors.
- Ingasetshenziswa ukwakha izingxenye ezincane kakhulu kodwa ezinamandla.

Ngakho-ke i-silicon iyisici esibaluleke kakhulu ekwakheni ubuchwepheshe bamanje, ikakhulukazi ama-microchips akhiwe yiyo asetshenziselwa izikrini, amakhompuyutha, amafoni nokuningi.

Question:

Amarekhodi ezokwelapha athathwa njengolwazi oluyimfihlo phakathi kodokotela nesiguli futhi avikela ubumfihlo besiguli. Ngaphandle kwemvume yesiguli, udokotela akavumelekile ukwabelana ngalolu lwazi nomunye umuntu ngaphandle uma kudingeka ngokomthetho.

Question:
Yimaphi amaphuzu alandelayo asekela impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika?
A.Benevolent hegemony
B.Ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism
C.amandla American
D.Konke okungenhla
GivenAnswer:
D. Konke okungenhla

Yonke imibono engenhla isekela impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika:

A. Benevolent hegemony - Umbono wokuthi amandla e-US asetshenziswa ngendlela enobuntu ukuze kuvikelwe umhlaba.

B. Ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism - Ukungasebenzi kwezinhlangano eziningi zezizwe ngezizwe ukuxazulula izinkinga zomhlaba kunikeza izizathu zokuthi i-US izenzele izinto ngokwayo. 

C. Amandla ase-US - Amandla amakhulu ezomnotho nezombutho e-US anikeza amandla okwenza izinto ngaphandle kokubonisana namanye amazwe.

Ngakho-ke, yonke le mibono iyizisekelo zokusekela i-unilateralism yase-US - indlela yokuthi i-US izenzele izinto ngokwayo emhlabeni kunokusebenzisana kakhulu namanye amazwe ezinqumeni zomhlaba.

Question:
Iyiphi kulezi zimfundiso ezilandelayo egxile endleleni umphakathi okwazi ngayo ukwenza imisebenzi edingekayo ukugcina uhlelo nokuzinza?
A.Functionalism
B.Ukusebenzisana
C.Rational-ukukhetha theory
D.Ithiyori yokungqubuzana
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kulezi ezibekiwe ithi A. Functionalism.

Functionalism igxile ekuqondeni indlela umphakathi osebenza ngayo njengomgudu ohlanganisiwe lapho izingxenye ezahlukene zenza imisebenzi ethile ukuze kugcinwe ukuzinza nokusebenza kahle komphakathi wonke.

Ngokwale thiyori, izinhlaka zomphakathi nezinhlangano zinezindima ezibalulekile ezibambayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umphakathi uyasebenza futhi uyaqhubeka. Lokhu kufaka phakathi imindeni, izikole, uhulumeni, ezomthetho, ezenkolo, njalo njalo. 

Ngakho-ke, Functionalism iyona thiyori egcizelela kakhulu ukubaluleka kwemisebenzi eyenziwa yizingxenye ezahlukene zomphakathi ukuze kugcinwe ukusebenza okuhlelekile nokuzinza komphakathi, uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izimfundiso ezinikeziwe.

Question:
Yisiphi isifo amagciwane e-herpes angabangeli?
A.Ukukhubazeka kwezinsana
B.Encephalitis
C.Isifo esithathelwana ngocansi
D.Umdlavuza
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo eyiqiniso ithi C. Isifo esithathelwana ngocansi.

Amagciwane e-herpes angabangela izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi ezifana ne-genital herpes. I-genital herpes ibangwa amagciwane e-herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) noma i-herpes simplex virus type 2 (HSV-2). Izimpawu zayo zibandakanya izilonda ezinomile noma izilonda ezivuvukele ezithweni zangasese.

Amanye amaphuzu:

A. Ukukhubazeka kwezinsana - Amagciwane e-herpes awabangeli ukukhubazeka kwezinsana ngqo.

B. Encephalitis - Amagciwane e-herpes angabangela i-encephalitis (ukuvuvukala kwengqondo), kodwa lokhu akuvamile. 

D. Umdlavuza - Amagciwane e-herpes awahlotshaniswa nomdlavuza ngokuqondile.

Ngakho-ke impendulo eyiqiniso kakhulu ithi amagciwane e-herpes angabangela isifo esithathelwana ngocansi esibizwa nge-genital herpes.

Question:
Imigqa ye-magnetic field mayelana nefomu locingo elithwala njengamanje
A.imibuthano
B.imigqa ye-radial
C.eddy imisinga
D.amandla loops
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile yi B. imigqa ye-radial.

Imigqa ye-magnetic field mayelana nefomu locingo elithwala njengamanje ibonakala njengezindingilizi noma imigqa ye-radial ehamba ngokuqondile kusuka phakathi nefomu locingo. Lokhu kubangelwa ukuthi imisinga kagesi efomu locingo ikhiqiza insimu ye-magnetic ngokuya ngoMthetho ka-Ampere.

Eminye imininingwane:

A. Imibuthano ayilungile ngoba ayichazi kahle ukuma kwemigqa ye-magnetic field.

Question:
Amaphoyisa athole ithiphu evela kumsakazi othembekile wokuthi owesilisa udayisa i-cocaine emzini wakhe. Izikhulu zabe sezithumela kumantshi incwadi efungelwe ebeka izimo ezibonisa imbangela engenzeka yokukhishwa kwencwadi yokusesha. Imantshi ikhiphe umyalelo wokusesha izidakamizwa ekhelini lendoda. Amaphoyisa aya emzini wale ndoda ashayela insimbi yomnyango. Ngesikhathi kungekho muntu ophendulayo, amaphoyisa agqekeza angena endaweni yokuhlala. Basesha amakamelo esitezi sokuqala futhi abatholanga ubufakazi obukhohlisayo, bese behamba ngaphandle futhi baqaphela umnyango ohlukile oholela esitezi sesibili sendawo yokuhlala. Bakhuphuka ezitebhisini bangena ekamelweni lokulala eliphezulu. Ngaphakathi ekamelweni amaphoyisa athole isitashi se-cocaine silele phezu komgqoki. Ngesikhathi la maphoyisa eqhubeka nokufuna igumbi lokulala, umsolwa wangena ekamelweni. Amaphoyisa abuza umsolwa ukuthi nguye yini lo muntu. Umsolwa uzichaze watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi asegumbini lakhe lokulala wabe esehlala esitezi sesibili sendawo yokuhlala. Umsolwa uchaze ukuthi le ndoda ibihlala esitezi sokuqala kanti izindawo ehlala kuzo zihlukene nezikammangalelwa. Noma kunjalo, umsolwa wabekwa eboshiwe wabekwa icala lokutholakala ne-cocaine. Umsolwa ufake isicelo sokuthi kukhishelwe ngaphandle i-cocaine ukuze ingeniswe ebufakazini. Isiphakamiso sommangalelwa kufanele sibe
A.inikezwe, ngoba iwaranti ayizange iqambe igama lommangalelwa.
B.inikezwe, ngoba iwaranti ayizange isho ngokucacile indawo okufanele iseshwe.
C.waphika, ngoba amaphoyisa ayekholelwa ngokunengqondo ukuthi ayesesha indawo yokuhlala yendoda ngesikhathi engena ezindaweni zokuhlala yommangalelwa.
D.waphika, ngoba iwaranti yayiqinisekisiwe futhi ikhishwe ngesizathu esingenzeka.
GivenAnswer:
D. waphika, ngoba iwaranti yayiqinisekisiwe futhi ikhishwe ngesizathu esingenzeka.

Isizathu:

1. Iwaranti yokusesha yayiqinisekisiwe futhi ikhishwe ngesizathu esingenzeka ngokuya kolwazi oluvela kumsakazi othembekile wokuthi owesilisa udayisa i-cocaine emzini wakhe.

2. Amaphoyisa ayesesha indawo yokuhlala yendoda ngokuya kwiwaranti, futhi athole ubufakazi be-cocaine ekamelweni lokulala lommangalelwa.

3. Noma iwaranti ayizange iqambe igama lommangalelwa, yayiqondiswe endaweni yokuhlala yendoda okwakukholelwa ukuthi idayisa i-cocaine, okuyilapho ummangalelwa ahlala khona.

4. Ukuthi ummangalelwa uhlala esitezi sesibili sendawo yokuhlala akwenzi mehluko, njengoba iwaranti yayiqondiswe endaweni yokuhlala yendoda, hhayi esitezini esithile.

Ngakho-ke, isiphakamiso sommangalelwa kufanele siphikwe ngoba iwaranti yayiqinisekisiwe futhi ikhishwe ngesizathu esingenzeka, futhi amaphoyisa ayesesha ngokusemthethweni indawo yokuhlala yendoda lapho kutholakale khona ubufakazi.

Question:
Umfuyi njengamanje ungumnikazi werekhodi lephasela lomhlaba eliqokwe ngokuthi "A. " Kuyinto ephakeme yezakhiwo ezimbili ezingomakhelwane entabeni. Muva nje, umsele wokuhambisa indle usuqalile ukukhipha iphunga elingathandeki ngaphesheya kwephasela "B. " Ngenxa yalokho, umlimi wamangalela umfuyi ngokungena ngokungemthetho ethandazela umonakalo odalwe uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi. Ukwahlulela kufanele kube ngenxa
A.umfuyi, ngoba isenzo somlimi sasingenayo izivumelwano ezivimbela ukusetshenziswa komhlaba komfuyi.
B.umfuyi, ngoba imbangela efanele yomlimi yokwenza kungaba ukuhlupha, kunokuba ungene ngokungemthetho.
C.umlimi, ngoba uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi lwaluyimbangela ye-proximate yomonakalo wommangali njengomthetho.
D.umlimi, ngoba umfuyi wayengenalo ilungelo lokuthuthukisa umhlaba wakhe ngendlela eyadala umonakalo komunye.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ithi C. umlimi, ngoba uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi lwaluyimbangela ye-proximate yomonakalo wommangali njengomthetho.

Izizathu:

1. Umfuyi wakha uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi ngasese ngo-2000 ngenkathi esengumnikazi womhlaba womabili. Loluhlelo lwalunepayipi elingaphansi komhlaba elalidlulela kuwo womabili amaphasela omhlaba.

2. Ngo-2005, umfuyi wathengisa iphasela "B" kumlimi, kodwa i-deed yentengiso ayizange iveze lutho ngohlelo lokuhambisa amanzi lomfuyi.

3. Kamuva, umsele wokuhambisa indle usuqalile ukukhipha iphunga elingathandeki ngaphesheya kwephasela "B," okwenza umonakalo kumlimi.

4. Ngokwemithetho, uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi lomfuyi lwaluyimbangela ye-proximate (eseduze) yomonakalo owenzeka ephaseleni lomlimi.

5. Umfuyi unomthwalo wokwazisa umlimi ngohlelo lokuhambisa amanzi ngaphambi kokuthengisa iphasela, futhi ukwehluleka ukwenza njalo kwadala umonakalo kumlimi.

Ngakho-ke, umlimi kufanele aphumelele ekumangaleleni umfuyi ngenxa yokuthi uhlelo lokuhambisa amanzi lomfuyi lwaluyimbangela eseduze yomonakalo owenzeka ephaseleni lomlimi.

Question:
Ngokomongo wokuhlangana kwembulunga yonke, singalichaza kanjani kahle igama elithi 'intuthuko'?
A.Igama elithi intuthuko libhekisela esimweni somuntu lapho kunenkululeko yokwesaba nokuswela; kunezinsiza ezanele zokugcina ukuphila futhi lokhu kuphila kungaba khona esimweni esikhululekile ekusongeleni, noma ukusongelwa okubonakalayo, kokuphazamiseka okungazelelwe.
B.Ukuze kubhekwe njengoba kuthuthukile, isizwe kumele sifinyelele isimo esithile sezomnotho nezombusazwe ngaphakathi kohlelo lombuso womhlaba wonke; umgomo walokho okwakha isimo 'esithuthukile' ngaleyo ndlela uchazwa yilezo zidingo zokusebenzisana kulolu hlelo.
C.Intuthuko iyindlela yokubhekana nokungalingani okuhambisana ne-neoliberal globalization. Kulesi simo, intuthuko ibhekisela ekhonweni labantu noma umphakathi lokusebenzisa ngempumelelo izinsiza nokwandisa ukusebenza kahle ekukhiqizeni nasekusabalaliseni, ukukhuthaza ukusatshalaliswa okulinganayo kwemali engenayo ngaphakathi emphakathini.
D.Ukuthuthukiswa komphakathi kubhekisela ezinhlelweni zenani lemibono nokuziphatha lapho abantu bawo bebhalisela khona. Ohlelweni lwamazwe omhlaba lomhlaba wonke lokhu kubhekisela ekwamukelweni kwemibono yentando yeningi yenkululeko yasentshonalanga kanye nomnotho wemakethe ekhululekile.
GivenAnswer:
Ngicabanga ukuthi impendulo A iyona echaza kahle kakhulu igama elithi "intuthuko". Intuthuko ngempela ibhekisela esimweni lapho abantu benenkululeko yokwesaba nokuswela, benamathuba okuzigcwalisa ngokwezidingo zabo zansuku zonke kanye nokuzithuthukisa ngokugcwele. 

Intuthuko ayiphathelene nje kuphela nezinga lomnotho noma ukwamukelwa kwemigomo ethile yezombusazwe, kodwa ibheka isimo esiphelele sabantu - ukuthi banaso yini isithunzi, inkululeko kanye namathuba okufeza amaphupho abo ngaphandle kokwesaba noma ukucindezelwa. Iphinde ibheke ukuthi umphakathi unakho yini ukulingana nokwabiwa ngokulinganayo kwemithombo.

Ngakho-ke, yize ezinye izimpendulo zinemibono ebalulekile, ngikholwa ukuthi impendulo A iyona echaza ngokugcwele ukuthi intuthuko iyini ngempela - isimo lapho abantu benokuphila ngenkululeko, isithunzi kanye nokuzigcwalisa.

Question:
Ucwaningo mayelana nokutholwa kolimi lwesibili luveze ukuthi yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo mayelana nezingane ezithola ulimi lwesibili
A.Ukuthuthukiswa kwabo kwengqondo kubambezelekile
B.Bane-articulation engcono kunezingane ezingahambisani nezilimi ezimbili
C.Ubuchule babo bolimi lwendabuko abukho umphumela kwizinga lokuthola ulimi lwesibili
D.Bakhuphule ukuguquguquka kwengqondo
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele kulesi sitatimende ngeyokuthi:

D. Bakhuphule ukuguquguquka kwengqondo

Ucwaningo oluningi luveza ukuthi izingane ezifunda ulimi lwesibili zithuthukisa amakhono abalulekile engqondo njengokuguquguquka (cognitive flexibility), ukucabanga okuzimele (independent thinking), kanye nokuqonda izimo ezahlukahlukene (understanding different perspectives).

Eminye imiphumela evezwe ucwaningo ngezingane ezilimi mbili ihlanganisa:

- Azikho ubufakazi bokuthi ukuthola ulimi lwesibili kubambezeleka ukuthuthuka kwengqondo
- Izingane ezilimi mbili zivame ukukhuluma ngokucacile (articulate) kunabanye 
- Ulwazi lolimi lwebele aluthinteki kabi ngokufunda ulimi lwesibili

Ngakho-ke, ucwaningo luyavumelana nokuthi ukufunda ulimi lwesibili kukhulisa ikhono lengqondo lokuguquguquka nezinye izinzuzo kubantwana.

Question:
Ngaphambi kokuba isiphakamiso sokuhlanganisa amadolobha amabili sifakwe ohlwini lokuvota, ummeli jikelele wombuso wakhipha umbono wokweluleka echaza ukuthi lesi silinganiso asizange, ngokubona kwakhe, siphule noma yiziphi izimiso ezisemthethweni noma zomthethosisekelo. Ngemuva kwalokho, lesi siphakamiso safakwa ohlwini lokuvota futhi saphasiswa kakhulu ngabavoti kuwo womabili amadolobha. Ngemuva kokhetho, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba kwenziwe ngokusemthethweni ukuhlanganiswa, abakhokhi bentela ababili abavela kwelinye lamadolobha baqala icala lokujoyina ukuhlanganiswa, behlasela umthethosisekelo wesiphakamiso. Icala lafinyelela enkantolo ephakeme yombuso futhi latholakala liwumthethosisekelo ngaphansi komthetho wombuso kanye nohulumeni. Manje abamangali bafaka isicelo sokufuna ukuthi lesi sikhwama sibuyekezwe yiNkantolo Ephakeme yaseMelika. INkantolo ingahle
A.ungalaleli icala, ngoba kwanqunywa ngezizathu zombuso ezizimele.
B.ungalilaleli icala, kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi libuyiselwe enkantolo yesifunda yase-federal.
C.ukuzwa izindaba zikahulumeni ezihilelekile, kodwa ukwenqaba ukubusa ngodaba lombuso.
D.thembela embonweni wokweluleka onikezwe ngummeli jikelele wombuso futhi ungalaleli icala ngokufanele kwalo.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile kule nkinga ingaba A. INkantolo Ephakeme yaseMelika ingase inqabe ukulalela leli cala ngoba linqunywe yinkantolo ephakeme yombuso ngezizathu ezisekelwe emthethweni wesifundazwe.

Izizathu zalokhu:

1. Ngokwejwayelekile, iNkantolo Ephakeme yaseMelika ayinamandla okubuyekeza izinqumo zezinkantolo zezifundazwe uma lezo zinqumo zisekelwe emthethweni wesifundazwe kuphela. 

2. Kulesi simo, icala lafinyelela enkantolo ephakeme yombuso futhi latholakala liwumthethosisekelo ngaphansi komthetho wombuso kanye nohulumeni, hhayi umthetho kazwelonke.

3. Umbono wokweluleka ovela kummeli jikelele wombuso awubalulekile lapha, njengoba iNkantolo Ephakeme yaseMelika ibheka izinqumo zenkantolo yombuso kuphela.

4. Ukubuyiselwa kwecala enkantolo yesifunda yase-federal akufanele, njengoba linqunywe yinkantolo yombuso ngezizathu zomthetho wesifundazwe.

Ngakho-ke, iNkantolo Ephakeme yaseMelika cishe ingazikhwebula leli cala ngoba linqunywe yinkantolo yombuso ngezizathu ezizimele zomthetho wesifundazwe.

Question:
Isisebenzi senkampani enkulu yokukhiqiza sithola umsebenzi udangele, futhi silandela umsebenzi kuphela ngemali. Isisebenzi senza kancane, futhi asigqugquzelekile ngakho-ke sikhiqiza inani eliphakeme kakhulu noma ikhwalithi engcono. Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, indlela engcono kakhulu ye-10 yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalo msebenzi kungaba
A.ukunikeza ukwenyuselwa imali kanye nenkokhelo yokukhuthaza umkhiqizo omkhulu
B.hlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza
C.ukwandisa amathuba okusebenzisana nomphakathi okunolwazi
D.ukuhlinzeka isisebenzi nge-tide yomsebenzi ethwele udumo olukhulu
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, indlela engcono kakhulu yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalo msebenzi kungaba ukuhlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza (B).

Isizathu salokhu yingoba ngokwe-Herzberg's theory, izinto ezifana nemali, izimo zomsebenzi, kanye nobudlelwano nabanye abasebenzi zithathwa njengezinto ezingagwemeki (hygiene factors). Lezi zinto zingavimbela ukungagculiseki, kodwa azikwazi ukwandisa ukukhuthazeka ngokwazo.

Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izinto ezifana nokubhekana nomsebenzi onika inselelo kanye nomqondo wokufeza zibizwa ngokuthi ama-motivators. Lawa ama-motivators angakwazi ukwandisa ukukhuthazeka komsebenzi ngokwawo.

Ngakho-ke, ukuhlela kabusha umsebenzi ukuze unike inselelo nomqondo wokufeza (B) kuyindlela engcono kakhulu yokwandisa ukukhuthazeka komsebenzi ngokwe-Herzberg's theory, kunezinye izindlela ezinikeziwe ezifana nokukhulisa umholo (A), ukwandisa ukusebenzisana (C), noma ukunikeza isikhundla esihloniphekile (D).

Question:
Inhloso yocwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili noma olunamaski amabili ku:
A.Ukufeza ukuqhathaniswa kwezifundo eziphathwayo nezingaphathwanga
B.Nciphisa imiphumela yokuhlukahluka kwesampula
C.Gwema umbukeli kanye nokukhetha isihloko
D.Gwema ukukhetha umbukeli nokuhlukahluka kwesampula
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele ku: C. Gwema umbukeli kanye nokukhetha isihloko

Ucwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili noma olunamaski amabili lusetshenziswa ukugwema umbukeli (bias) kanye nokukhetha isihloko (selection bias) ocwaningweni.

- Umbukeli (bias) ungenzeka uma abacwaningi noma abahlanganyeli bocwaningo bazi ukuthi ubani othola ukulashwa okuthile noma okunye, okungaba nomthelela emiphumeleni yocwaningo.
- Ukukhetha isihloko (selection bias) kwenzeka uma kukhethwa abahlanganyeli abanezimpawu ezithile ngenhloso, okungaphazamisa imiphumela yocwaningo.

Ngakho-ke, ucwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili noma olunamaski amabili lusiza ekugwemeni lezi zinkinga ngokugcina abacwaningi nabahlanganyeli bengazi ukuthi ubani osesigabeni sokulashwa noma esinye, okusiza ukuthola imiphumela eqondile nengenamibandela.

Ezinye izinhloso (A, B, D) aziyona inhloso eyinhloko yocwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili, yize zingaba yizinzuzo ezengeziwe zalolu hlobo locwaningo.

Question:
Isitolo esikhulu sasisanda kuvulwa ngemuva kokuvalwa kwamasonto amabili ukuze kulungiswe. Ngekusasa lokuvulwa kabusha, owesifazane ubethenga ngesikhathi evele wawa waphuka umlenze. Ngemuva kwalokho, lo wesifazane wamangalela isitolo esikhulu ngokulimala komuntu siqu. Egqoke isudi yakhe, lo wesifazane uthe wakhubeka phezu kwebhakede lokupenda ebelilele kwelinye lama-aisles. Ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala, lo wesifazane wafonela elinye ikhasimende eyofakaza ukuthi ngesikhathi ethenga wezwa i-thud, waphenduka wabona lo wesifazane ewela phansi. Uphinde wafakaza wathi wabona ibhakede lokupenda elingenalutho lilele izinyawo ezimbalwa ukusuka emlenzeni wesifazane. Ekuhlolweni kwesiphambano, ikhasimende langena ekushintshanisweni okuxabana nommeli wesitolo esikhulu. Ngesikhathi ebuzwa umbono wakhe ngokuthi yini eyabangela ukuwa kowesifazane, umthengi wafakaza, "Wawa ngoba wakhubeka ebhakedeni. " Uvumile nokho ukuthi empeleni akazange abone lo wesifazane ehambela ebhakedeni. Ummeli wesitolo esikhulu wabe esebuza umthengi umbuzo olandelayo:"Uma ungabonanga owesifazane ehambela ebhakedeni, wazi kanjani ukuthi wawa ngenxa yalo?" Umthengi waphendula wathi, "Ngoba intombi yami eyayithenga nami yangitshela kamuva ukuthi yabona lo wesifazane ehambela phezu kwebhakede. " Ummeli wesitolo esikhulu uhamba ukushaya impendulo yokugcina yekhasimende. Uma ijaji lecala lichitha isiphakamiso sommangalelwa futhi livumela impendulo yomthengi ukuba ime, cishe kuyoba ngoba
A.impendulo yomthengi imenywe ngumbuzo wommeli wesitolo esikhulu.
B.impendulo yomthengi yayisekelwe olwazini lokuqala.
C.impendulo yomthengi yayiyisitatimende sokubona kwakamuva.
D.impendulo yomthengi yayiwumbono womqondo wamanje.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo elungile ingaba ngu-B: impendulo yomthengi yayisekelwe olwazini lokuqala.

Isizathu salokhu yingoba umthengi wafakaza ngolwazi aluthola ngqo kwindodakazi yakhe eyayikhona ngesikhathi sengozi. Indodakazi yabona ngqo ukuthi owesifazane wahamba phezu kwebhakede ngaphambi kokuwela phansi. Ngakho-ke, ubufakazi bomthengi bususelwa embonweni wokuqala wendodakazi yakhe, hhayi nje umbono noma ukubona kwakamuva.

Izimpendulo A, C, no-D azilungile ngoba:
- Umbuzo wommeli wesitolo esikhulu awumenyanga impendulo yomthengi kodwa wacela nje incazelo (A).
- Impendulo yomthengi ayisekelwanga ekuboneni kwakamuva kodwa kwimibono yokuqala yendodakazi (C). 
- Impendulo yomthengi ayiyona umbono wamanje kodwa isekelwe olwazini oluthile (D).

Ngakho-ke, impendulo yomthengi iyamukeleka njengobufakazi obusekelwe olwazini lokuqala oluvela endodakazini yakhe eyayikhona ngesikhathi sengozi.

Question:
Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-54 ubudala uza ehhovisi ngoba uye waba nobuhlungu bokudubula ngezikhathi ezithile phezu kwesidlele sakhe sokunene nomhlathi phakathi namasonto ama-3 edlule. Isiqephu ngasinye sobuhlungu sihlala i-1 yesibili noma ngaphansi. Ubuhlungu buvame ukuvuswa umoya obandayo, ukuhlafuna, ukuvuselela okuthintekayo, nokuxubha amazinyo akhe. Akazange abe nobuhlungu ebusweni noma ekhanda. Umlando wezokwelapha uyaphawuleka ngokungezwani kwekhanda, ukukhuluphala, nokuhlinzwa kwe-gastric bypass. Uneminyaka engu-165 cm (5 ft 5 in) ubude futhi unesisindo esingu-62 kg (137 lb); BMI kuyinto 23 kg / m2 . Izimpawu ezibalulekile zivamile. Isiguli asikwazi ukubekezelela ukuthinta ohlangothini lwesokudla lobuso. Akukho ubuthakathaka bobuso noma ukulahlekelwa umuzwa. Insali yokuhlolwa komzimba ayikhombisi ukungahambi kahle. I-CT scan yekhanda ngokungafani nangaphandle kwayo ayibonisi ukungahambi kahle. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyi-pharmacotherapy efanele kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwemininingwane enikeziwe, isiguli sibonakala sinesifo se-trigeminal neuralgia. Lesi yisimo esivame ukubangela ubuhlungu obushaqisayo, obusabekayo ebusweni, obuvuswa yizinto ezifana nomoya obandayo noma ukuthinta.

Phakathi kwezinketho ezinikeziwe, i-carbamazepine ingaba ukwelashwa okufanele kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi. I-Carbamazepine iyidrug yokuqala yokwelapha i-trigeminal neuralgia futhi iboniswe ukuthi inciphisa ubuhlungu obuhambelana nalesi sifo.

Ezinye izidakamizwa ezinikeziwe, njenge-lamotrigine, i-levetiracetam, ne-topiramate, zingasetshenziswa ukwelapha ukukhathazeka kwezinzwa, kodwa azivamile ukusetshenziswa njengokwelashwa kokuqala kwe-trigeminal neuralgia.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kakhulu ingaba i-A: Carbamazepine, njengokwelashwa okufanele kakhulu kwalesi siguli ngalesi sikhathi ngokusekelwe yimininingwane enikeziwe kanye nezimpawu.

Question:
Ummeli jikelele uyinhloko yokuthi yiziphi izinhlangano ezilandelayo?
A.Ikomidi lezobulungiswa leSenate
B.UMnyango Wezobulungiswa
C.UMnyango Wezwe
D.IJaji u-Advocate General's Corps
GivenAnswer:
Ngiyaxolisa, angikwazi ukuphendula lo mbuzo ngokugcwele ngoba awunikezi ulwazi olwanele ukuthi ngikwazi ukuqhathanisa lezi zinhlangano ezibalulwe ngenhla. 

Kodwa-ke, ngingasho lokhu okulandelayo mayelana nalezi zinhlangano:

- IJaji u-Advocate General's Corps ingxenye yoMnyango Wezobulungiswa wase-United States futhi ibhekene nezindaba zomthetho nezomthetho sisekelo. 

- UMnyango Wezobulungiswa nawo ungaphansi kukahulumeni wase-US futhi ubhekene nokuqinisekisa ukuthi imithetho iyalandelwa nokuphenya amacala obugebengu.

- UMnyango Wezwe ubhekene nobudlelwano bamazwe omhlaba kanye nezindaba zangaphandle zase-US.

- Ikomidi Lezobulungiswa leSenate liyikomidi lephalamende lase-US elibhekene nezindaba ezithinta umthetho sisekelo namalungelo abantu.

Ngakho-ke lezi zinhlangano ziyahluka ngezinjongo namandla azo, kodwa zonke zidlala indima ebalulekile ekuqinisekiseni ukusebenza ngendlela kukahulumeni wentando yeningi.
